Class AbstractItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • item.AbstractItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockedSlot, Claws, Fangs, Flame, Hex, Jaw, ObsidianShard, OrbOfFlight, Proboscis, Sword, Widget

    public abstract class AbstractItem
extends java.lang.Object

    Ryan Luchs
